info.title: Keycloak Admin REST API
info.description: This is a REST API reference for the Keycloak Admin

delete.summary: Clear any user login failures for all users   This can release temporary disabled users
Clear any user login failures for the user   This can release temporary disabled user

parameters.name: flowAlias
parameters.description: Name of the existing authentication flow

delete.summary: Remove client-level roles from the client’s scope.
Remove a set of realm-level roles from the client’s scope

parameters.name: roleContainerId
parameters.description: either realm name OR client UUID

parameters.name: roleContainerId
parameters.description: either realm name OR client UUID

delete.summary: Unregister a cluster node from the client
Remove roles from the role’s composite
Remove client-level roles from the client’s scope.

Delete client-level roles from user role mapping
Delete a mapper for the identity provider

Revoke consent and offline tokens for particular client from user
Remove a social login provider from user
Delete client-level roles from user role mapping
